props.title: Cache hits
props.query: SELECT average(`consul.agent.aclCacheHitPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Cache misses
props.query: SELECT average(`consul.agent.aclCacheMissPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Stale queries
props.query: SELECT average(`consul.agent.staleQueries`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Peers
props.query: SELECT average(`agent.peer`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Transaction time
props.query: SELECT average(`agent.txnAvgInMillisecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Transactions
props.query: SELECT average(`consul.agent.txns`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Transaction max time to apply
props.query: SELECT average(`agent.txnMaxInMillisecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: KV store update time
props.query: SELECT average(`agent.kvStoresAvgInMillisecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: KV store Samples
props.query: SELECT average(`agent.kvStores`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: KV max time to update
props.query: SELECT average(`agent.kvStoresMaxInMillisecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto
